text: m-Anisidine is an organic compound with the formula CH3OC6H4NH2. A white solid, commercial samples can appear grey or brown owing to air oxidation. It is one of three isomers of the methoxy-containing aniline derivative. ==References== ==External links == * * Category:Anilines Category:Hazardous air pollutants Category:IARC Group 2B carcinogens
title: M-Anisidine
